review: Full screen video streaming to my tv is VERY choppy for me, unless I go direct from youtube.  Installation was super simple.

review: Works well.  Simple setup, easy to use.
author: David B.

review: Arrived in a very timely manner.  Box and item in perfect condition. Easy to install.  Purchased it to use with my smart phone app "showbox" so as to put up movies from my galaxy s4 to the tv.....Works perfectly.  Thanks.
author: grace reynolds

review: Good product... just wasn't for me.
author: ben

review: How wonderful...a product that works as advertised. Great price and facilitated my breaking free of cable TV.
author: Lawrence Wentzel

review: Just an excellent product. Everyone uses it in the house and a great travel gadget to have on trips away from home.

review: Amazing device.  The support from programs have increased exponentially since buying it and still continues to grow.  It's great if you own an android phone or pc.
